answers.answer: Could be a sign of preeclampsia, hows your blood pressure

question: I have only 8 days left till my due date and every time I wake up from sleeping or taking a nap my lips are swollen... my gums feel a tiny bit swollen too and only once my eyelids were a bit swollen. Can anyone help me with some answers?
title: swollen
